Object.Name: LongTest
Object.Data: mary had a little lamb, little lamb, little lamb. Mary had a little lamb whos fleece was white as snow. everywhere that mary went, mary went, mary went. everywhere mary went the lamb was sure to go..... YUP

Object.Data: A small key. Use it to open locked doors that you may find.

Object.Name: NPC1
Object.Data: People have seen strange things going on in that cave up ahead.. I wouldn't go in there if I was you.

Object.Name: NPC2
Object.Data: ... As you walked up to me, I felt a chill down my spine.. It is probably the wind.
